mapper.select: select p_serialNo, count(*) as reviewCnt from review group by p_serialNo;

select product3.*, img2.covered_src from (select product2.*, img.src from (select product.*, review.reviewCnt from (select * from product order by p_saleCount desc limit 10) as product left join (select p_serialNo, count(*) as reviewCnt from review group by p_serialNo) as review on product.p_serialNo = review.p_serialNo) as product2 left join (select p_serialNo, p_productImg as src from product_img as src where true and p_productImg like "%_1.%") as img on product2.p_serialNo = img.p_serialNo) as product3 left join(select p_serialNo, p_productImg as covered_src from product_img where true and p_productImg like "%_2.%") as img2 on product3.p_serialNo = img2.p_serialNo

select product3.*, img2.covered_src from (select product2.*, img.src from (select product.*, review.reviewCnt from (select * from product where true AND p_serialNo like concat(#{keyword}, "%") order by p_saleCount desc limit 10) as product left join (select p_serialNo, count(*) as reviewCnt from review group by p_serialNo) as review on product.p_serialNo = review.p_serialNo) as product2 left join (select p_serialNo, p_productImg as src from product_img as src where true and p_productImg like "%_1.%") as img on product2.p_serialNo = img.p_serialNo) as product3 left join(select p_serialNo, p_productImg as covered_src from product_img where true and p_productImg like "%_2.%") as img2 on product3.p_serialNo = img2.p_serialNo;
